---Shinsengumi in Anime---

has now been released on DVD in the USA up until vol. 3
the next couple of volumes should finally enter in the Bakumatsu era 
feature Okita and Hijikata...so just wait a little bit longer...

---See Files "Downloads"---
New! It contains information on Takeaki Enomoto* and how he and many 
former bakufu people *assimilated into the new government system the 
rest of the scans are about the Tokyo Education Museum Exhibits (Fujita 
Goro later in life worked at this very museum, the numerous exhibits 
are things he himself saw on a daily basis)
https://mywebspace.wisc.edu/tnamwong/web/enomotoeducmuseum.pdf

*Takeaki Enomoto led the failed attempt to establish the Republic of 
Ezo (Hakodate/Hokkaido) --- Hijikata (and remaining Shinsengumi) fought 
and died for this cause

---Work in Progress---
Fujita Family Aizu connections mapped out visually to prevent confusion
but it is still messy (^_^).  If anyone found errors or more connection 
please email me 
http://www.shinsengumihq.com/Fujitaconnections.jpg

[Off-Topic or Side-Issues]

---Yamakawa Sisters (as examples of Aizu women in the Meiji Era)---
English news article on women volunteering to be nurses in the Seinan 
War of 1877
https://mywebspace.wisc.edu/tnamwong/web/TokioTimes4.21.1877.pdf
***one of the sisters in this article was Takagi Tokio's co-worker at 
the school later known as Ochanomizu 
http://www.ocha.ac.jp/history/index-e.html

---Work in Progress (Joushitai in the Meiji Era)---
Found wonderful stuff on Yamamoto Yaeko and her husband Jo 
Neesima...still reading about this family
Who are the Joushitai?  Please see http://www.shinsengumihq.com/WB.htm
To read the only complete narrative of these brave women of Aizu please 
visit see 
https://mywebspace.wisc.edu/tnamwong/web/FemaleCombatantsAizu.pdf 
Yamamoto Yaeko was well known for her skills with the rifle however I 
found this pic in a book about the Neesima family...
Look for girls with naginata (other pics are of Yae and Jo)
https://mywebspace.wisc.edu/tnamwong/web/NeesimaYY.zip
